snippet: It’s time for Jeb Bush, Marco Rubio & Co. to vanquish the Republican Party’s demons, starting with a certain grotesque real estate mogul.
abstract: Frank Bruni Op-Ed column contends Republican presidential candidates are squandering opportunity to capitalize on absurdity of Donald Trump by not defining themselves in stark opposition to him; holds Republicans could seize on Trump's comments to offer saner, more compassionate ideas; says Republicans are failing, as they did in 2012, to take on their party's lunatic fringe, and in process empowering Trump by allowing him to expose their timidity.
lead_paragraph: It’s time for Jeb Bush, Marco Rubio & Co. to vanquish the Republican Party’s demons, starting with a certain grotesque real estate mogul.

headline.print_headline: The Wasted Gift of The Donald
headline.main: The Wasted Gift of Donald Trump
